description: Commands to manage Arc resource bridge.

commands.name: az arcappliance get-credentials
commands.summary: Command to get the on-premises infrastructure credentials used by Arc resource bridge to manage on-premises resources.
commands.syntax:
az arcappliance get-credentials [--config-file]
                                [--credentials-dir]
                                [--name]
                                [--overwrite-existing {false, true}]
                                [--partner {false, true}]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--yes {false, true}]

commands.name: az arcappliance get-upgrades
commands.summary: Command to fetch the available upgrades for an Appliance.

commands.name: az arcappliance list
commands.summary: Command to list Arc resource bridge resources.

commands.name: az arcappliance notice
commands.summary: Command to display the EULA & Notice File link for Arc resource bridge.

commands.name: az arcappliance show
commands.summary: Command to provide information about an Arc resource bridge Azure resource. This is useful to monitor the status of the resource bridge.
